Articles.Content: Does anyone know where or how i can obtain the craft files for the ships in each of the scenario files?
Are they not the ones included in the default ships folder in the KSP root?
unfortunately no... I believe the scenario files are just saves and you can look in the folders for them and see the section for crafts but its empty.
In that case you will have to use one of the craft extractor tools. You should be able to find them using the search string persistence and extract.
